summary: This is a header/case information document from the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit for case 21-58, United States of America v. Ghislaine Maxwell. It shows the case was filed on January 12, 2021, terminated on April 27, 2021, and lists the defendant-appellant and her attorneys.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant appealing her case in the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit.

persons.name: David Oscar Markus
persons.context: An attorney from the firm Markus & Markus, PLLC, representing Ghislaine Maxwell in her appeal.

persons.name: Bobbi C. Stemheim
persons.context: An attorney, also representing Ghislaine Maxwell in her appeal.

connections.description: David Oscar Markus is listed as an attorney representing Ghislaine Maxwell in her appeal.
Bobbi C. Stemheim is listed as an attorney representing Ghislaine Maxwell in her appeal.

events.title: Appeal Case Filed
events.description: The appeal case United States of America v. Ghislaine Maxwell (21-58) was filed in the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit.

keyFacts: The document is a case header for appellate case 21-58, United States of America v. Ghislaine Maxwell.
The case was filed on January 12, 2021, and terminated on April 27, 2021.
Ghislaine Maxwell is listed as the defendant-appellant, represented by attorneys David Oscar Markus and Bobbi C. Stemheim.
